title: Quitting League. (Well Kinda)
body: I've been playing League for about 1.5 or 2 years and it isn't as fun as it use to be. I'll still be watching the professional game, but I just don't find playing as much fun. So I'm only going to be playing like 2 games per week if that and using League as like a chat.

replies.body: So see you in a week then?

I liked this comment because you will see me in a week.(well you might or might not) Because, I'm still part of this community I just don't want to play anymore this game has just gotten a boring play style. (Don't get me wrong this game is great but its just lost its I guess touch while I have been playing and I don't find it as interesting.)
I felt that way too. Best if you go do other shit. Play other games. You're probably just tilted.. You'll learn to have fun again.

I'm currently playing secret ponchos atm a recently released game I just don't find League as fun anymore with the trolls, people in ranked that not even try or feed 1 kill and be like "f*** you sup can't help me at all. Let me die 24/7." then disconnects. Now I know trolls can't be stopped permanently like some trolls can but not all.
"If you stop and throw stones at every dog that barks; you'll never get to your destination"
just go away no one cares
